info.title: ReCAP Bib API
info.description: Translate Sierra MARC bib/item data to ReCAP SCSB XML

get.summary: Get SCSB XML for a Sierra Bib
get.description: Translate a Sierra Bib MARC record and the associated items into ReCAP SCSB XML (see: https://htcrecap.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/RTG/pages/27691070/XML+Schema)

parameters.name: customerCode
parameters.description: ReCAP customer code to use for associated Item(s)

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Lookup the Bib by an associated Item barcode

parameters.name: bibId
parameters.description: Lookup the Bib by the Bib ID

parameters.name: includeFullBibTree
parameters.description: Return the full Bib tree (i.e. all Items) for the Bib
